General.Name: Digjam Limited
General.Description: Digjam Limited designs, manufactures, and trades in woolen worsted textiles and fabrics under the DIGJAM brand in India. The company was formerly known as Digjam Textiles Limited and changed its name to Digjam Limited in March 2016. Digjam Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Jamnagar, India.
